Job Description: Embedded Software Developer 2 to 5 years Candidate should have knowledge in embedded C,  Basics of electronics and Microcontroller,  Embedded software and hardware.  Knowledge on GSM and GPS will be an added value.  Graduates of B. E/ M. E/ M. s. c in EEE/ ECE can apply.
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
